title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research on quantum computing concepts and simulation techniques. Identify target audience and their needs.

title: Architecture Design and System Planning
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the simulation engine, user interface, and data storage components. Define the technology stack, development tools, and consider performance optimization strategies for interactive coding exercises. Provide a detailed plan for each component, with emphasis on modularity, scalability, and maintainability. Outline potential integration challenges, and propose solutions to ensure seamless functionality. Suggest unit testing strategies for each component to ensure quality and reliability. Also, discuss how the system will handle large datasets, provide a roadmap for future improvements such as real-time data analysis, and address considerations for accessibility and security. If possible, suggest potential collaboration with open-source quantum computing projects for improved functionality. Update the architecture design documents periodically to reflect changes in the development process. Suggest milestones for each phase of the project and provide a timeline for their completion. In the implementation state field, set the state as 'IN_PROGRESS' when work begins.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the simulation environment, including interactive coding exercises, visualization tools, and user feedback mechanisms.

title: Quantum Computing Simulation Engine Development
description: Implement the core simulation engine that models quantum computing concepts and executes user-provided code. Integrate with the user interface and data storage components.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases for the simulation environment, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests. Ensure code quality and functionality.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. Ensure smooth deployment and monitoring of the application.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the simulation environment, covering installation, usage, and advanced features.
